column2: Sandstone Peak in Santa Monica Mountains
column3: An amazing 6-8 mile hike, with extraordinary views of the Pacific Ocean. Since recent fires, there is a great deal of exposure, so I'd recommend wearing a hat, sunscreen, sunglasses, and carrying water. Trails are obvious and there are several options of out and back treks, or loop treks.
